extendedInfo.description: The Tae Kwon Do Sparring Scorer app is used to score all of your martial arts sparring matches.  It will allow you to enter up to 10 rounds of sparring at up to 59 mins per round.  It will allow you to setup a timed rest period between rounds.  Also, it will allow you to score the match while the rounds are going.Now includes a Poomsae Scorer!!Features:* Seperate Round timer, Rest period timer, and Injury timer* Now has a simple and advanced scorer options* Scoring for both opponents* About screen with information about app.* About screen contains World Taekwondo Federation rules of sparring.* Text description for each of the steps in each of the Taeguek forms, Black Belt forms through 4th Dan, and the  Palgwae forms.* All forms directions can be read to you through text to speech.* The Simple interface is the same scorer you have been using.* The Advanced interface allows for deductions and warnings.* Referee Hand signal guide.* Now includes a Poomsae Scorer!* Tournament tracker to help you keep track of your players poomsae scores.This free app is ads supported.  The pro version is now available and gives more features with no ads.  Pro contains rules for Olympic style sparring and closely follows the World Taekwondo federation rules for sparring and scoring.  The pro version also gives better landscape support and support for larger screens.If you have a request for a feature or any trouble with the app, please email me and we will see what we can do.Lanugages: English, Spanish, French, Korean, Indonesian

reviews.title: Works Well
reviews.comment: Timer and score reset when the phone is rotated. Lock the screen to avoid resetting.  other than that, this is an excellent FREE app. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Very easy to use, excellent way to keep track of points when sparring in class
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Round end sound could be something a little more realistic, like a bell. See Aces boxing round timer in play store for ideals. Could use video link in forms and which rank each is for, for those new to these forms, you know ever school doesn\'t use the same forms. Text to speach could use some adjustment settings if possible, talks a little too fast.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love how you have listened to reviews!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Alright
reviews.comment: Good, but its difficult to score points with score button being small. Deduction abilities also needed. Taekwondo masterkit app is pretty good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Referee deductions needed
reviews.comment: Viewing referee deductions very important and needed. Every 2 kyongos (warnings) a point auto adds to opponent.. Every Kamchung (full point deduction) auto adds a point to opponenent. Any combo of deductions totalling 4 point infractions ends the match in disqual and opponent wins. Displaying deductions is very important
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The new interface is much better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does what it\'s made to do. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Constantly crashes on my droid 2. Don\'t download.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple, but very useful app! Haven\'t found anything else comparable for Android. Hope to see more features added eventually.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: happy mum
reviews.comment: thank you thank you disabled mum needed support to help mum and child to learn kicks and patterns and practice at home between classes looked at everyone in play store this is perfect support for class. thank you
reviews.author: A Google User
